content: from step 1 stitch count 40 double_crochet and 40 chain 1 space round 16 third round diamond flower 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst round 13 double_crochet in all stitches around 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst 3 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 2 double_crochet over next chain space 4 chain 1 and skip all of chain slip_stitch and chain 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet 5 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 4 double_crochet over next chain space 6 double_crochet in each of the next three double_crochet stitches 5 repeat steps 3 and 4 38 times 7 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 6 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 8 chain 1 and skip all of chain slip_stitch and chain stitch count 80 9 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 10 repeat steps 6 to 9 eight times round 14 first round diamond flower 11 double_crochet in next last stitch 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst 12 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 2 double_crochet in each of the next three stitches stitch count 70 double_crochet and 10 chain 1 space page | 4 round 17 double_crochet in all stitches around variant 1 v1 5 dcs between motifs refer to spacing of 1 to commence the round in the previous round stndst motifs in images 2 and 3 2 double_crochet in each of the next 3 dcs 3 double_crochet over chain space substitute the basic beanie pattern rounds 14 to 17 with the rounds detailed below 4 double_crochet in each of next 7 dcs work all other rounds as per basic beanie pattern including round 18 5 double_crochet over chain space 6 repeat steps 4 and 5 eight times v1 round 14 first round diamond flower 7 double_crochet in each of the last 3 dcs 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst 8 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 2 double_crochet in each of the next four stitches stitch count 80 3 chain 3 and skip the next stitch 4 double_crochet in each of the next nine stitches round 18 chain 1 space for every other stitch 5 chain 3 and skip the next stitch 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst 6 repeat steps 4 and 5 six times 2 chain 1 and skip the next stitch 7 double_crochet in each of the next four stitches 3 double_crochet in next stitch 8 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 4 chain 1 and skip the next stitch stitch count 72 double_crochet and 8 chain 3 space 5 repeat steps 3 and 4 38 times 6 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 v1 round 15 second round diamond flower stitch count 40 double_crochet and 40 chain 1 space 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round
